column1: Section:FIN-Cost Accounting, Cost Accounting Reporting (7 Reqs)

column4: Provide for multiple user defined cost reports.
Report expenses, statistics, revenue by any element in the chart of accounts.
Provide departmental reports broken down by cost accounting codes, fund, department, and organizational unit.
Provide capability to export cost data to excel spreadsheet.
Provide a set of system assurance reports and control totals that reconcile with data source systems.
Provide user-defined reports showing any of the labor distribution elements by a user-specified date range.
